# [Interview #692: 17th Shard Interview, Entry #19](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=692#19)

#### 17th Shard

Now that we've seen Shadesmar can you elaborate more on it? Perhaps why you wanted a map of it included in the book?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.
